name: Dreams of D4RK - Fragment Edition
description:
A brutally challenging action game. Plagued by nightmares, you draw your sword in an attempt to finally clear your head.

This version of the game represents my submission to the Fragment Jam! The game is unfinished, but I'd still love any feedback you have. I plan to continue development of this game after the jam.

Thank you in advance for playing my game. It means the world to me.

If you want updates to the game's development, feel free to follow me on twitter:

 https://twitter.com/abhisundu

If you enjoyed the soundtrack and you want to hear more, check out my soundcloud:

 https://soundcloud.com/abhisundu
